tests.name: Run hashtable cosntructor, etc. tests
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="Constructor resize get capacity and get size ops" && timeout 60 make clean test-1-hashtable

tests.name: Run hashtable insert tests
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="Insert ops" && timeout 5 make test-1-hashtable

tests.name: Run hashtable remove tests
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="Remove ops" && timeout 5 make test-1-hashtable

tests.name: Run hashtable haskey/exists tests
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="HasKey and exist ops" && timeout 5 make test-2-hashtable

tests.name: Run hashtable clear tests
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="Get size ops" && timeout 5 make test-2-hashtable

tests.name: Run hashtable resize tests
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="Clear ops" && timeout 5 make test-2-hashtable

tests.name: Run Add users
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="Add users" && timeout 5 make test-3-passserver

tests.name: Run Remove users
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="Remove users" && timeout 5 make test-3-passserver

tests.name: Run Validate users
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="Validate users" && timeout 5 make test-3-passserver

tests.name: Run Check existence of users
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="Check existence of users" && timeout 5 make test-3-passserver

tests.name: Run Update passwords for users
tests.run: export SUB_TEST="Update passwords for users" && timeout 5 make test-3-passserver
